name: Unnamed Dungeon game (ComedyStudios)
description:
A small game where you have to clear a randomly generated dungeon. You can get new weapons from chests. You  win by killing all the monsters in the last room.

 Controls: 

  •  tab to open inventory
  • left click to use your weapon 
  • e for interactions 
  • wasd for movement

This is my first game, all kind of criticism and feedback is welcome
